dct_title_s: Rapid reconnaissance, Aliwal North to Caledon River and Odendaal Stroom to Smithfield
dct_description_sm: Detailed notes, including: "This road is practical for all arms; it is rough in places but hard. Gradients are steep in places. I did not see many flocks of sheep or cattle but a good many horses."
dct_publisher_sm: Heliozincographed at the Ordnance Survey Office
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
